casebody.data:
First Department,

April, 1958

(April 29, 1958)* Walter N. Smith et al., Appellants, v. Robert Wagner, as Mayor of the City of New York, et al., Respondents.

Not published with other decisions of April 29, 1958, 5 A D 2d 986 and Sept. 23, 1958, 6 A D 2d 1002.— [Rep.

Motion denied. Concur'— Breitel, J. P., Rabin, M. M. Frank, Valente and Stevens, JJ.
